features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Complete toolkit for AI-powered personnel management

profiling.title: Psycho-profiling
profiling.description: Deep psycho-profiling of each person based on validated methodology confirmed by meta-analyses in experimental psychology: personality type, motivation, communication style, work preferences. Complete psychological portrait with scientific precision.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Analysis & Instructions
aiAnalysis.description: AI analyzes the psycho-profile and generates personalized recommendations: how to motivate, communicate, delegate tasks to this person. Ready-made scenarios for every situation.

selection.title: Best Candidate Selection
selection.description: AI compares existing psycho-profiles and selects the perfect match for the role and team

compatibility.title: AI Compatibility Forecast
compatibility.description: AI analyzes psycho-profiles to predict conflicts, team dynamics, and turnover risks

teamBuilding.title: Team Formation

hiring.title: Hiring
hiring.problem: Unclear if candidate fits team and company culture
hiring.solution: Validated methodology creates candidate psycho-profile, AI compares with team profiles and provides compatibility forecast and work recommendations

promotions.problem: Risk of appointing wrong person to key position
promotions.solution: Assessment of growth potential, compatibility with new role and team

teams.title: Team Formation
teams.problem: Teams conflict due to personality incompatibility
teams.solution: AI analyzes existing psycho-profiles and selects optimal team composition. Warns about potential conflicts and provides management recommendations
teams.result: 25% increase in team productivity, 40% fewer conflicts

talent.title: Talent Management
talent.problem: Don't understand employee motivation, losing best people
talent.solution: Psycho-profile reveals true motivators of each person. AI interprets data and provides personalized recommendations for retention, development, and motivation
talent.result: 35% increase in key employee retention, targeted work with each person

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about product and implementation

list.question: Where does analysis data come from?
list.answer: We integrate with your HR systems (ATS, HRIS) and supplement with employee competency assessment through validated tests. Data can also be uploaded manually via Excel/CSV.

list.question: How accurate is the assessment methodology?
list.answer: Our psycho-profiling methodology is based on peer-reviewed research and meta-analyses in experimental psychology with validity of 0.7-0.8 (correlation with real business results). AI is used to interpret profiles and generate recommendations, improving accuracy over time.

list.question: How long does implementation take?
list.answer: Full implementation — 2-4 weeks. First week we digitize staff and set up integrations, second — train team and launch first dashboards. First results visible in a month.

list.question: How do you ensure data security?
list.answer: AES-256 encryption, access control, audit log, GDPR compliance. Hosting options: cloud (AWS/Azure) or on-premise. Regular pentests and security audits.

list.question: How is ROI calculated?
list.answer: ROI comes from four sources: recruiter time savings (-40%), reduced external agency costs (-20%), decreased early turnover (-30%), faster position closure (-20%). Calculator on page shows estimate for your company.

list.question: Can it be used only for hiring?
list.answer: Yes, you can start with just the hiring module (best-candidate selection). Other modules (talent management, team formation, risk prediction) can be added later as needed.

list.question: How does personnel digitization work?
list.answer: Employees take tests taking about an hour: competencies, personality type, motivation. We use highly validated methodology confirmed by meta-analyses in experimental psychology. AI then interprets results into clear insights and recommendations.

list.question: What if the model makes a mistake?
list.answer: AI provides recommendations, but final decision always stays with humans. We show model confidence level and explain what data the conclusion is based on. Accuracy improves over time through feedback loop.

list.question: Do you have clients in our industry?
list.answer: We work with IT, e-commerce, fintech, manufacturing. Each industry has its specifics, so we adapt models to your processes and position requirements.

list.question: How does post-implementation support work?
list.answer: Dedicated customer success manager, weekly syncs first 2 months, then monthly. 24/7 technical support via chat and email. Regular product updates at no extra charge.
